name: 185631fd-4336-5ac5-8816-433d31a52ade
notes: Spokes is an online service for conversational corpus data search and exploration as part of the Polish CLARIN infrastructure. The underlying corpus contains more than 2 million words of time-aligned transcriptions of casual spoken discourse. The service is available both as a web application and as a REST service.
title: Spokes search engine for Polish conversational data
